text: Raecius is a genus of African araneomorph spiders in the family Udubidae, first described by Eugène Simon in 1892. ==Species== it contains six species: *Raecius aculeatus Dahl, 1901 — Congo *Raecius asper Thorell, 1899 — Cameroon, Equatorial Guinea (Bioko) *Raecius congoensis Griswold, 2002 — Congo *Raecius crassipes L. Koch, 1875 — Ethiopia *Raecius jocquei Griswold, 2002 — Ivory Coast *Raecius scharffi Griswold, 2002 — Tanzania ==References== ==External links== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Udubidae
title: Raecius
